ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Has anyone else used these recently and noticed?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, had a chance to quiz GZ on the songs this weekend at eqfest 2000 in Houston, TX. Pixe and such, are being/have been changed, during the patches that are
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, had a chance to quiz GZ on the songs this weekend at eqfest 2000 in
Houston, TX.

Pixe and such, are being/have been changed, during the patches that are
going live...he wasn't specific on it.

LULLABYE WILL BE CHANGED!

GZ: "Look for some VERY interesting things to be happening to Lullaby soon"
GZ: "We have been thinking about bard mez, we didn't want them to infringe
on the Enchanter role, as that is what Enchanters do best, BUT we don't
think that giving bards some mez abilities will hurt"

These are not exact quotes, but pretty close.

MacGrough Mich'Rathe
Solusek Ro Wanderers

p.s. One helluva weekend, even if it felt like being in the Karana's.
EQFest 2000 was a blast!
Check out eq.stratics.com and watch the official eq site for news!
Thanks Ron!
----- Original Message -----
From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, November 03, 2000 2:17 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Has anyone else used these recently and noticed?


> Well, supposedly no. However the spdat.eff file did get patched last
> weekend when I logged in. They can also change some spell effects in the
> database without taking the servers down. I think this might actually
have
> gone in with the last patch and may have either been unintentional, or
they
> may be trying it out to see if they see any unbalancing effects from it
> being live before they announce that it is live. That way if they have to
> change it fewer people will notice.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4(n)
> [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Friday, November 03, 2000 1:06 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Has anyone else used these recently and noticed?
>
>
> Don't think the server I am on (E'ci) has gone down for the scheduled
server
> maintenance Abashi mentioned. Haven't noticed any downloaded files
either.
> Kitasi and I play on the same server so thats why I was wondering if the
> patch went in unannounced.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
> Sent: Friday, November 03, 2000 10:10 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Has anyone else used these recently and noticed?
>
>
> At 09:46 AM 11/3/00 -1000, you wrote:
> >Has the patch that will improve Pixie Strike, Song of Twilight and nerf
> >Jonthan's Provocation even gone in yet? I was under the impression that
it
> >wouldn't go in until sometime next week.
> >Galtin of E'ci
>
> has either your server gone down or have you downloaded any new files?
>
> if not, then it is impossible.
>
>
>
